Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the connection between the video and the COVID-19 pandemic by falsely linking it to an incident at a coronavirus quarantine center.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support its assertion that the video shows a Muslim man spitting on Indian police officers.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is related to the COVID-19 pandemic and the scuffles at the quarantine facility, which is not supported by the available information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video was circulated since February 2020, weeks before the incident at the quarantine center, as confirmed by local police.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation provided by local police, who stated that the video is unrelated to the COVID-19 pandemic and depicts an incident from February 2020.
